description: Agents should always save work plans as plan.json in consistent format. Enables orchestrator discovery and tracking.
problem: Agents create plans in various formats/locations. Hard to discover and track.

solution.enforcement: Add to CLAUDE.md in all projects, MCP persona instructions

plan_json_requirements: Must be named plan.json (not plan.md, PLAN.md, etc.)
Must include status field (pending, in_progress, complete)
Must include tasks array with completion status
benefits: Orchestrator can scan and discover all plans
Status tracking via plan.json progress field
